FuncDef: This command configures the rate for ICMPv6 redirect messages. When configured, ICMPv6 redirects are generated when routes are not optimal on the router and another router on the same subnetwork has a better route to alert that node that a better route is available.

ParaDef.Info: Limits the number of redirects issued per the time frame specified in seconds parameter. Values-10 to 1000.
Determines the time frame, in seconds, that is used to limit the number of redirects issued per time frame. Values-1 to 60.

ExtraInfo: Default: redirects 100 10 (when IPv6 is enabled on the interface)
